name: Chad Z (Prototype)
description:
This is a small prototype of a zombie video game, I made it while I was learning to develop video games, it has hundreds of bugs, if you want to play it keep in mind that it is only a prototype and I made it while I was learning.
Controls:
If you have less than half life you can heal yourself with the H key.  Move with WASD, aim with the mouse and shoot with the click.
